Brutus - The Abyssal Barbarian. 
 An entity from a land unknown. Found unconcious by a group of barbarian warriors. 
 Having lost his memories, he does not remember where he came from, what he really is, and what his name was. Accepted as one of their own, the barbarians gave him the name Brutus.
 He wields a large shield and a battle axe.

Eve - The Silver Assassin
 A Midland commoner.With no family around, she grew up by herself on the streets. 
Her family died in the war between the Land Above and Down Under. 
She is skilled in acrobatics and wields two silver-plated daggers.

One of the several Panda Mages descended from the Land Above to bring peace to Midland. \nAfter witnessing the death of his fellow Panda Mages, he decided to stay in Midland to seek vengeance - to hunt for the mysterious Red Panda that betrayed them. \n He wields a staff made of bamboo, imbued with divine energy.
